Core package
============

This page documents the `core` package (structures, conveyors and creators).

.. note:: These pages use autodoc to pull docstrings from the source. If
   your environment lacks graphical dependencies (e.g. ``pygame``), consider
   mocking them in ``conf.py`` before building the docs.

.. automodule:: core.conveyor
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
